input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Taylor Stitch"
Reference Product Name: "The Democratic Chino"
Reference Product Description:
Originally issued to American soldiers during WWII, the first military chinos were celebrated for their comfort, versatility, and impressive ruggedness. They proved so popular, in fact, that soldiers held onto their well-worn pairs even after discharge, and as more and more civilians took notice, the style became a fixture of garages and workshops as well as college campuses and city streets all across the country. Featuring 100% Responsible materials and an updated silhouette, The Foundation Pant is both a reinvention of our earlier chinos and an elevated reimagining of the all-purpose originals, built to help you start your day on solid ground. Because it's been garment dyed and washed, it has the character of a well-loved vintage piece, and it'll continue to pick up a ton of nuance with wear. Cool herringbone accents at the waistband and the pockets serve as a nod to the style's military origins. SPECIFICATIONS Classic medium rise, tailored fit, straight through the thigh with a slight taper from knee to leg opening. Available in 32" inseam. 8-oz. 100% organic cotton. 5-oz. 100% organic cotton herringbone pocketing. Garment dyed and washed for a vintage feel. Front slash pockets allow easy entry into pockets. Low-profile welt coin pocket inset at waistband. Two back welt pockets. 4-hole vintage military style button at waistband. YKK zipper fly. Bound fly and outseam. Wash cold and tumble dry low. Made in China. Model is 6'1", wearing a 32.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Pace Breaker Jogger Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Trousers'
  - Name='Ministry Of Supply Men's Pace Performance Casual Golf Chino Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L Warpstreme Size 33 Grey'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Aviator Chino Slim Straight Leg Pants'
  - Name='Lululemon Men's Commission Pants'
  - Name='Ministry Of Supply Men's Chinos Aero Standard Fit Pants'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Democratic All Day Pant in Light Khaki Broken Twill'
  - Name='Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Apres Twill Shorts'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Pleated Air Chino'
  - Name='Everlane Men's Straight Fit Performance Chino'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Slim Fit Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Versatility Pant Men's'
  - Name='Rhone Nanoprojects Blue Chinos, Menâ€™s 32x29'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Pro Tokyo Trouser'
  - Name='Rhone Men's Commuter Slim Fit Five Pocket Pants'
  - Name='Rhone Commuter Pro Trouser'
  - Name='Club Monaco Men's Travel Pants'
  - Name='Uniqlo Slim Fit Flat Front Chinos Pants'
  - Name='lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit 5 Pocket Pant 32L Warpstreme'
  - Name='Ministry of Supply Men's Momentum Flat Front Straight Leg Chino Pants'
  - Name='Ministry Of Supply Pace Tapered Chino'
  - Name='Men's Taylor Stitch The Democratic Foundation Pant'
  - Name='UNIQLO Men's Wide Fit Half Pants'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trousers in Warpstreme
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are classic-fit trousers with a focus on performance fabric (Warpstreme), similar in silhouette and intended use as versatile pants, though likely more technical and less traditional cotton chino fabric.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Pace Breaker Jogger Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are jogger pants, which differ in silhouette and style from traditional chinos; less formal and more athletic, so moderately relevant but less similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Slim-Fit Stretch Cotton Trousers
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit cotton trousers with stretch, designed similarly in form and function as chinos, making them quite relevant though materials and fit may differ slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry Of Supply Men's Pace Performance Casual Golf Chino Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These are casual chino pants designed for golf, indicating a similar chino style with performance enhancements, closely aligned with the reference's casual chino concept.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's ABC Classic-Fit Trouser 37L Warpstreme Size 33 Grey
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit trousers made from technical fabric (Warpstreme), similar use and fit to chinos but material differs.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry of Supply Men's Aviator Chino Slim Straight Leg Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: These appear to be slim straight leg chinos, very close in style and fit to the reference, likely targeted at similar customers.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Lululemon Men's Commission Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designed as pants with a tailored look, probably for business casual wear. Similar in silhouette and use but may use different fabric technology than traditional chinos.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Ministry Of Supply Men's Chinos Aero Standard Fit Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard fit chinos, closely matching the classic chino aesthetic and functionality, very similar to the Taylor Stitch product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Democratic All Day Pant in Light Khaki Broken Twill
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and very likely the same or very similar product line, highly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Taylor Stitch Men's Organic Cotton Apres Twill Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts rather than full-length pants; fabric is organic cotton twill but usage and silhouette differ significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Pleated Air Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pleated chinos made for breathability; similar core product type and construction with slight difference in styling (pleats).

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Everlane Men's Straight Fit Performance Chino
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight fit performance chinos align closely with the reference product in both silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit commuter pants designed for versatility, similar in silhouette and intended use, but may differ in fabric tech and detailing.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pants designed for versatility, but without specifying chino styling; moderately relevant due to potential stylistic and material differences.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rhone Nanoprojects Blue Chinos, Menâ€™s 32x29
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Designated as chinos, matching the reference product's type and likely similar fit and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Trousers designed for commuter use, similar in function and shape but possibly more technical and less traditional chino construction.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit pants with chino styling and technical fabric, good match in silhouette but differs in fabric and tech features.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Straight leg chinos with flat front, very similar in design and intended use to the reference product.
